record.dc:title: 165UN6 Hill Farm Site 2UN6, Union County, Tennessee. Mound 2. Feature 1, Clay fireplace or altar.
record.wpa:narrative: A raised clay fireplace; hard baked and well preserved except SW corner broken. Raised two inches from floor. Pit circular with gently sloping walls. Corners well rounded. White ashes in fire pit.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustrations on file at the institution. See also photographs 164UN6 [fhm01768], 225UN6 [fhm01771], 166UN6 [fhm01772], and 226UN6 [fhm01773].
